heading: Caged Heart of Frozen Terror â€“ Diablo 4 Malignant Heart
content: Caged Heart of Frozen Terror is a Necromancer Malignant Heart granting Defensive buffs. Caged Hearts are socketed into their corresponding colored sockets on your jewelry. Once inserted, hearts can be replaced, but NOT removed. These Malignant Hearts were introduced to Diablo 4 in Season 1 - Season of the Malignant. Caged Hearts can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. More info coming soon!
